Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to chokeholds and other such restraints
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass, and the President to sign, the Eric Garner Excessive Use of Force Prevention Act of 2019 (H.R. 4408), which would prohibit police chokeholds and other tactics that result in asphyxiation.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Eric Garner Excessive Use of Force Prevention Act of 2019 (H.R. 4408)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.6144 and S.6670A, legislation that would establish the crime of strangulation in the first degree; disregard of banned employment procedures.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish the crime of strangulation in the first degree; disregard of banned employment procedures. (A.6144 and S.6670-A)
